description: Bans a user from the system, preventing them from signing in. Existing sessions are revoked and the user cannot create new sessions until unbanned. Requires admin role.

userId.description: The ID of the user to ban

reason.description: Optional reason for banning the user

403.description: Forbidden - User does not have admin role

x-specs.given: An authenticated admin user and an active user
x-specs.then: Returns 200 OK and bans user with all sessions revoked

INSERT INTO users (id, email, password_hash, name, email_verified, banned, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (2, 'target@example.com', '$2a$10$YourHashedPasswordHere', 'Target User', true, false, NOW(), NOW())
INSERT INTO sessions (id, user_id, token, expires_at, created_at) VALUES (1, 1, 'admin_token', NOW() + INTERVAL '7 days', NOW())
INSERT INTO sessions (id, user_id, token, expires_at, created_at) VALUES (2, 2, 'user_token', NOW() + INTERVAL '7 days', NOW())
